tool_description: This API provides on a monthly basis, the amount of nitrous oxide in the atmosphere from 2001 to the present. Expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).

api_list.name: Nitrous endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the current levels of nitrous oxide in the atmosphere.

optional_parameters.name: nitrous
optional_parameters.description: An optional object to specify additional filters or parameters for the request.
